alert.note: Alert for Angelina; Cherokee; Nacogdoches (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 05 at 1:39AM CDT until October 05 at 2:30AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Nacogdoches County in eastern Texas... Northwestern Angelina County in eastern Texas... Central Cherokee County in northeastern Texas... * Until 230 AM CDT. * At 138 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Maydelle to 11 miles west of Rusk to 10 miles east of Elkhart to near Grapeland, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Rusk, Alto, Wells, Morrill, Ponta, Sacul, Forest, Douglass, Maydelle, Cushing, Gallatin, Reklaw, Lilbert, Linwood, and Looneyville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
